text: Dimaadua ga helekai gi Moses, “Au gaa hai dagu hagababa gi digau Israel. Au gaa hai agu mee haga goboina i mua digaula, nia mee digi kila loo i tei gowaa i henuailala. Gei digau ala i do baahi gaa mmada gi nia maa, gei digaula ga iloo bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua dela e mee di hai di mee hagamadagudia huoloo adu gi di goe.
